tests package¶

Submodules¶

tests.conftest module¶

tests.conftest.boundary_container(request)[source]¶

container with samples on corners of container

tests.conftest.closed_container(request)[source]¶

container with 0 volume

tests.conftest.container(request, simple_container, empty_container, closed_container, boundary_container)[source]¶

Pretty hacky “Meta” container to allow the parametrization of multiple containers. See https://github.com/pytest-dev/pytest/issues/349 for more answers.

tests.conftest.empty_container(request)[source]¶

container with volume > 0 but no samples

tests.conftest.simple_container(request)[source]¶

standard populated container
